0: Pour: A person is pouring a liquid from one container into another, such as pouring milk into a glass
1: Pullup: A person is lifting their body up using their arms while hanging from a bar
2: Punch: A person is striking an object with their fist, such as a punching bag or a person's face
3: Push: A person is exerting force on an object with their hands, such as pushing a door open or pushing a shopping cart
4: Pushup: A person is lowering and raising their body using their arms while lying face-down on the ground
5: Ride bike: A person is pedaling a bicycle to move themselves forward on a path or road
6: Ride horse: A person is sitting on a horse and controlling its movements using reins and their body weight
7: Run: A person is moving quickly on their feet, either in a straight line or in a zig-zag pattern
8: Shake hands: Two people are clasping their hands together and moving them up and down as a formal greeting or agreement
9: Shoot ball: A person is throwing a ball towards a target, such as a basketball hoop or a soccer goal
10: Shoot bow: A person is using a bow and arrow to shoot at a target, such as a bullseye or a piece of fruit
11: Shoot gun: A person is aiming and firing a gun at a target, such as a paper target or a clay pigeon
12: Sit: A person is resting their body on a chair or a bench in a seated position
13: Situp: A person is lying on their back and lifting their upper body towards their knees as a core exercise
14: Smile: A person is showing a happy expression by curving their lips upward and sometimes showing their teeth
15: Smoke: A person is inhaling and exhaling smoke from a cigarette or a pipe
16: Somersault: A person is flipping their body over in the air, either forwards or backwards, by tucking their head and rolling their body
17: Stand: A person is supporting their body weight on their feet in a vertical position
18: Swing baseball: A person is hitting a baseball with a bat and trying to hit it as far as possible
19: Sword: A person is holding a sword in their hand, either for decoration or for use in a fight or performance
20: Sword exercise: A person is practicing a series of movements with a sword as a martial art or dance form
21: Talk: A person is communicating with another person using words spoken out loud
22: Throw: A person is propelling an object through the air using their arm, such as throwing a frisbee or a ball
23: Turn: A person is rotating their body around a fixed point, either by pivoting on one foot or by spinning in a circle
24: Walk: A person is moving forward on their feet in a slow and steady manner, one foot in front of the other
25: Wave: A person is raising their hand and moving it back and forth as a greeting or farewell gesture
